name: Santa Sledge Race:Christmas
description:
Merry Christmas everyone!
Christmas is around the corner,listen to fun Christmas Music!
Feel the real christmas mood!

In this awesome sled race game,choose your rider - Santa or penguin,drive your sled to deliver these Christmas gifts for children.The snow road is so slippery,complete the Levels without crashing!To be the king of race and collect gifts as more as possible.Enjoy this Christmas Ride.

Game Features :
- Nice and good graphics
- Simple Control
- Smooth motion.
- Different levels and amazing tracks.


Ride With Christmas Santa Racing.
